question.title: Create a custom CRUD query timesout during API call
question.body:
I am learning to build APIs with CrudRepository.

I am trying to mimic this:

I have 3 controllers, services, repos, etc. Mood, Stress and User.

Inside of my MoodRepository, I have the following:

@Repository
public interface MoodRepository extends CrudRepository<Mood, Long> {

    @Query("""
        SELECT DISTINCT u.name, u.userName, m.mood, s.stress, m.date as MOOD_DATE, s.date AS STRESS_DATE FROM User u JOIN Mood m ON u.id = m.userId JOIN Stress s ON u.id = s.userId""")
        List<BadDayResponse> badDayReport();

}

I am able to build and launch the app, but when I hit the API, I get the following in console:

Hibernate: select distinct u1_0.name,u1_0.user_name,m1_0.mood,s1_0.stress,m1_0.date,s1_0.date from users u1_0 join moods m1_0 on u1_0.id=m1_0.user_id join stress s1_0 on u1_0.id=s1_0.user_id

Postman never completes.

Inside of my BadDayResponse class, my code looks like this:

@Getter
@Setter
@NoArgsConstructor
public class BadDayResponse implements Serializable {

    private Date moodDate;
    private Date stressDate;
    private String name;
    private String userName;
    private int mood;
    private int stress;


    BadDayResponse(String name, String userName, int mood, int stress, Date moodDate, Date stressDate) {
        this.name = name;
        this.userName = userName;
        this.mood = mood;
        this.stress = stress;
        this.moodDate = moodDate;
        this.stressDate = stressDate;
    }
    
}

I am trying to get the SQL code to run and put it into a list that I can then iterate on and complete my task.

I am going to post pictures of the Entity classes.

What can I try next?
